311273.「ここは ムニエカの町。 \n とても平和で 穏やかな町で 住民の方々も\n み:
This place is called Munieka. It's a very
peaceful and quaint town where its
residents are quite friendly.

311277.「ナブナブ大サーカス団の 出張公演に\n ご来場いただき ありがとうございます！:
Thank you so much for coming to the Grand
Nab-Nab Circus' performance! Please enjoy
the show to your heart's content!

311285.「へへっ 見てくれ！\n サーカスの芸が 大ウケしちまってよ！\n 俺たち すっ:
Heh heh! Feast your eyes! The circus act's a
huge hit with the locals! We've become the
talk of the town!

311287.「この町の住民は みんな 楽しいことが大好き！\n アンタたちみたいなのは 大歓:
The residents here just LOVE anything that's
fun! Folks such as yourselves are very welcome
here. Stay as long as you like!

311289.「エドアルドさんのお家は 町の北側……\n 高台にある 赤い屋根のお屋敷です。:
Eduardo's home is the red-roofed mansion
at the north side of town.

311290.「私たちも ご一緒します。\n 階段をのぼって 行きましょう。:
We'll come along, too. Let's head up the
stairs.

311292.「ここが エドアルドさんのご自宅です。\n とても 気さくで 素敵な方なんですよ:
This is Eduardo's home. He's very friendly
and quite wonderful.

311301.「エ エドアルドさん。\n 大丈夫ですか？: M...Mr. Eduardo. Are you quite all right?

311302.「……ハッ！？\n キミたちは エステラ君と ナブレット君！\n 大変だ！ 僕の:
*gasp*! It's Estella and Nablette!
This isn't good! My Chupie's...

311303.「ハハッ ハデに転んだなあ。\n まーた あの鳥に逃げられちまったのか。:
Nyeheheheheh! You really took a fall there!
That bird got away again, eh?

311304.「ハハハ 情けないことに その通りなんだ。\n アイタタタタ……。:
Ehehehe... It's embarassing to say, but you're
right. Ouch, ouch, ouch...

311305.「エステラ君 ナブレット君。\n すまないが 僕の代わりに また\n チュピちゃ:
I hate to ask this of you two, but do you
think you could help me get Chupie back
again?

311306.「僕はこの通り 脚を痛めてしまって……。\n 追いかけられそうになくてね……。\:
As you can see, my leg isn't in the best shape
right now... Ow, ow, ow, owwww....

311307.「もちろんです。無理をなさらないで。\n チュピちゃんのことは お任せください。:
Of course we will. Please don't push yourself.
Leave Chupie to us.

311308.「チュピちゃんには 脱走癖があって……\n 少し前にも 私とナブレットさんで\n:
Chupie has a habit of escaping...and not too
long ago, Nablette and I caught him.

311309.「隊長。申し訳ありませんが チュピちゃん捜しを\n 手伝っていただけないでしょう:
Excuse me for asking this, but we'll need your
help to find Chupie. Let's find him before he
escapes town!

311311.「ああ チュピちゃん！ 町の外はキケンだから\n 僕のそばから 離れちゃダメだと:
Oh, my Chupie! You KNOW I always say it's
dangerous outside of town, so you mustn't
just wander off like that!

311312.「チュピちゃんを 連れもどしてくれて\n 感謝するよ。……おっと キミたちふたり:
Thank you for bringing Chupie back to me.
Oh...? I suppose I haven't introduced myself
to you two yet, have I?

311313.「ようこそ ムニエカの町へ！\n 僕は ここの町長を任されている\n エドアルド:
Welcome to Munieka! My name is Eduardo, and I
am the mayor of this fine town. It's a
pleasure to meet your acquaintance.

311314.「あたしは ポルテ。こっちにいるのは\n 我らが調査隊の <pc>隊長だよ！\n:
I'm Porte! Next to me is <pc>,
captain of our exploration team!
Pleasure to meet you, Eduardo!

311315.「エドアルドさんは 天才人形師でもあって\n チュピちゃんや そこにいらっしゃる:
Eduardo is also a genius puppeteer. Chupie
and Mudara over there were created by him.

311316.「ハッハッハッハ！\n 天才だなんて 大げさだな。\n このくらいは ちょちょい:
Ahahaha! A genius, you say...? That's
a bit of an exaggeration. It's just easy
for me to do, that's all.

311317.「そういや お前さん\n 脚は もう平気なのか？\n けっこう ハデにやってたじ:
By the way, is your leg okay now? You were
actin' quite dramatic back there.

311318.「心配ご無用！ キミたちが帰ってくるまでに\n 完璧に 直しておいたからね。ご覧:
No need to worry! I fixed it right up before
you all came back. As you can see, I'm even
able to dance! Rah-tah-tah! ♪

311319.「そうだ！ 本日 エステラ君とナブレット君の\n 歓迎会を 開催する予定なのだが:
That's right! Today we're going to throw a
welcoming party for Estella and Nablette,
so you two are welcome to join as well!

311320.「ブラボー！ おたくらのダンス\n 最高じゃねえか！ 全員 ナブナブサーカス団に:
Bravo! Your dance moves are spectacular!
You all should think about joining the
Grand Nab-Nab Circus!

311321.「料理も すっごくおいしー！\n こんなおもてなしを してくれるなんて\n エド:
The food is absolutely delish! What an
upstanding guy to give us this kind of
hospitality!

311322.「ハッハッハッ ありがとう ありがとう！\n この町は 気にいっていただけたかな:
Hahahah! Thank you, thank you!
So you've really taken a liking to this town,
yes?

311323.「ええ とっても！ 景観も美しく\n 住民の皆さんは 本当に優しくて……\n ず:
Yes, very much so! The scenery is so beautiful
and its residents so kind... I would just love
to stay here forever if I could.

311324.「それは 良かった！\n この町は 僕のすべてだからね……。:
That's good to hear!
This town means everything to me...

311325.「僕も キミたちのことが 大いに気にいってね。\n キミたちに 特別な贈り物を用:
I like you all so much that I've prepared a
special gift. I hope it pleases you!

311327.「ナブおじさん！？\n どうしたの？ だいじょうぶ……？: Mr. Nab! What's wrong? Are you okay...?!

311329.「あれ どうしたんだろ……。\n 目の前が 暗く……:
What...is happening to me...?
Everything's...going dark...

311330.「まったく この愚か者が……。\n 相手の術中に まんまとハマりおって……。:
Honestly, what a fool you are...
You've fallen right into their trap...

311331.「目を覚ませ <pc>。\n こんなところで 寝ている場合ではない。\n 己がつ:
Wake up already, <pc>.
This is no time to be sleeping.
You still have your duty.

311333.「そういえば 料理を食べてたら\n 急に 気が遠くなって……。\n もしかして:
Now I remember... After I ate that food, I
felt all woozy... Maybe it was laced with
something...?

311334.「外側から 鍵が かかってる……。\n あたしたち 閉じこめられちゃったみたい。:
It's locked from the outside...
Guess we're locked in here.

311335.「それに エッちゃんと\n ナブおじさんが いない……。\n ふたりとも どこに:
Etsie and Mr. Nab are gone, too...
Wonder where they went...

311336.「……ほへ？ さっき あたしが\n <pc>を 起こさなかったかって？\n うう:
...what? You're asking if I'm the one who
woke you up? Uh uh. I was asleep the whole
time, so I have no clue.

311337.「こうしていても しかたないよね。\n とにかく ここから 脱出しなくっちゃ！:
Well, no use just twiddling our thumbs.
We have to get out of here!

311338.「……うーん。\n この扉 鍵がかかってて 開かないみたい。\n いかにもって感:
Hmmm.... Seems like it's locked and won't
open. It's pretty suspicious, don't you think?

311339.「鍵穴が ないみたいだから\n ３ケタの 暗証番号を入れて\n 開ける仕組みなん:
There's no keyhole, so I guess it can only
be opened with a 3-digit code...

311340.「そこに 誰かいるの？\n 隠れてないで 出てきて！:
Is someone there?! Stop hiding and show
yourself!

311341.「へぅぅぅ……。\n ご ごめんなさい 怪しい者ではぁ……。\n ひどいこと し:
Eeeeeeekkk....
A...apologies... Nothing suspicious here...
Please don't do anything bad...

311342.「あれ？ キミは……\n エドアルドさんと いっしょにいた\n ドロテア……だっ:
Huh? You...were with Eduardo, right?
Mudara...was it?

311343.「どうして 隠れて あたしたちのこと見てたの？\n キミが ふたりを誘拐した犯人:
Why were you hiding and watching us? Were you
the one who kidnapped us?

311344.「ち ち 違いますぅ～！\n ドロテア 誘拐なんてしていません……！\n ただ:
N...no...no way...! Mudara didn't k-kidnap
anybody...! She was j-just watching...

311345.「……見ていた？\n もしかして エッちゃんと ナブおじさんが\n どこにいるか:
...you were watching? Then, do you know where
Estie and Mr. Nab went?

311347.「おふたりは そのぉ……。\n ご主人様……エドアルド様が\n そちらの扉の奥に:
The two of them, um....
M-Master...Eduardo took them b-behind that
door over there...

311348.「やっぱり エドアルドさんが 犯人だったんだ！\n むきーっ！ ちょっとでも\n:
I KNEW Eduardo was behind this! Grrrrr! I
thought he was a good guy, even just a
little!

311349.「料理に 薬なんて 盛るくらいだもん！\n ふたりが 何されるか わかんないよ。:
The worst he did to us was spike our food!
Who knows what he'll do to them! We gotta
save them fast!

311350.「ドロテア！\n この扉の暗証番号を 教えて！\n あたしたち 仲間を助けたいん:
Mudara! Tell me the door code! I want to save
my friends!

311351.「ひぃぃ ごめんなさい……。\n ドロテア 暗証番号 知らないですぅ……。:
Aaiiieee.... S-sorry...
Mudara...doesn't know the code...

311352.「えええ！ そんなぁ！\n どうしよう……。:
Whaaat? Seriously...!?
What do we do...?

311353.「あ あの……暗証番号はわかりませんけど\n 手がかりは ありますぅ。\n 扉を:
U...um... She... doesn't know the code but
there's a clue... Please look closely at the
door...

311354.<center>汝 扉の秘密を 暴きたくば\nムニエカに伝わる舞を 舞え\n朝昼:
If you wish to discover the secrets that lie beyond this door, one must perform the traditional Munieka dances of morning,
afternoon, and night. Those who dance and turn correctly shall see the door open before them.

311355.「この文章は ご主人様が\n 書かれたものなんですけど ご主人様も\n よく 暗:
This passage was written by the Master, though
it seems he often forgets the code...

311356.「こうして 扉にヒントを書いたんですぅ……。\n この町の人たちは 踊りが大好き:
So that's why there's a hint on the door...
Since the people of this town love dancing,
maybe talking to them will help...?

311357.「でもさ ドロテア。\n キミは エドアルドさんに仕えているんでしょ？\n あた:
But, Mudara...you work with Eduardo, right?
Are you sure it's okay to help us?

311358.「えっと……ドロテア ご主人様の人形なので\n ご主人様の邪魔しちゃ いけないん:
U-umm... Mudara wishes not to disturb the
Master because she is his doll... But she
feels sorry for all of you, so...

311359.「……ありがとう ドロテア。\n キミって とっても 優しいんだね。: Thanks, Mudara. You really are kind.

311360.「<pc>！ ドロテアの言う通り\n ムニエカの町の人から 話を聞いて\n 暗証:
<pc>! Mudara's right. Let's talk to
the townsfolk and see if we can't find
a clue to the code!

311362.「早くふたりを 助けてあげなくちゃ。\n まったく 本当に エドアルドさんって\:
We have to save them right away!
Sheesh... that Eduardo is really something
else.

311363.「あたしたちを\n 無理やり 眠らせて 監禁するなんて\n いくらなんでも ひど:
Forcing us to sleep and locking us up is
just too much!

311364.「ご ご主人様 悪いヒトじゃないんですぅ。\n いつも みんなに 優しく接してく:
M-master is not a bad person... He is always
so kind to everyone, and...he always thinks
of the town's well-being first...

311365.「そ それに それに！\n かつて このムニエカの町を\n お救いくださった 英:
A...and be-besides! He's a hero that once
saved Munieka...

311367.「昔 恐ろしい災害が 世界を襲い\n 美しかった ムニエカの町の\n すべてが:
A long, long time ago...a terrible disaster
struck this world...and everything that was
once beautiful in Munieka was lost...

311368.「町を失い ドン底の私たちに\n 救いの手を 差しのべてくださったのが\n 他で:
We'd lost our town, with nothing left...
but it was Eduardo of all people who
came to our aid.

311369.「エドアルド様は 私たち\n ムニエカの住民のため 長い間\n 町の再建に 心血:
Master Eduardo has worked tirelessly to
rebuild this town for us... For the sake of
everyone living in this town...

311370.「町が元通りに復興し 私たちがこうして\n 平和に 暮らすことができるのは\n:
It's all thanks to him that this town was
restored to its former glory...and that we
are able to live peacefully...

311371.「そんなことがあったんだ……。\n エドアルドさんは この町のことを\n とても:
I had no idea... This town must be really
special to you then, Mr. Eduardo.

311372.「はいぃ……。ご主人様は 町のみんなが\n 快適に暮らせるよう いつも 細かなと:
Y-yes... The Master is always attentive to
the tiniest of details, just so everyone here
can live comfortable lives.

311373.「もう二度と みんなが\n 悲しい思いをしないように……。\n ずっと 笑顔で:
I hope that no one will ever have to feel
sad again... May everyone live happily ever
after with a smile on their faces.

311374.「本当に 優しくて すばらしいお方……。\n ドロテアは そんな エドアルド様の:
Indeed, he is truly a kind and wonderful
person... Mudara deeply respects him,
wholeheartedly...

311375.「あのさ もしかして……\n ドロテアって エドアルドさんのこと\n 好きなの？:
Do you think...
Mudara, do you love Eduardo?

311376.「ひぃ！ とんでもないですぅ！\n ドロテアみたいな ドジで 醜い人形が\n ご:
Eeeekkk!! D-don't be silly! Such an ugly and
clumsy doll harboring feelings for the
M-Master is much too terrifying...!

311377.「そんなことないよ！ 誰かを好きになるって\n とっても ステキなことだと思う。:
That's not true! I think it's a wonderful
thing to fall in love with someone. I'm sure
he would be happy to hear that from you!

311378.「そ そうですかねぇ……でへへ……。\n いつか ご主人様に ドロテアの想いのす:
Y...you really think so... Eeee...heheh... I wonder...if one day the Master will understand Mudara's feelings for him...
Eee hee hee...

311379.「でも……そんな人が どうして\n エッちゃんと ナブおじさんを\n 誘拐したり:
But...why would someone like him kidnap Estie
and Mr. Nab?

311380.「エドアルドさんが 本当に悪い人かどうか……\n この先に進んでみれば わかるこ:
Whether or not Eduardo is really a bad guy...
we'll find out soon enough. Come on, you
two!

311381.「ここは……いろいろ 置いてあるね。\n エドアルドさんの アトリエかな？:
This place...sure has a lot of stuff.
Is this Eduardo's studio?

311382.「うわっ！？ ビックリしたぁ……。\n これ……人形？:
Waah!! You scared me...
Is this...a doll?

311383.「本物の人間かと 思っちゃった。\n よくできてるねぇ。:
I thought it was a real person for a second
there... It's really well made.

311384.「<cs_pchero>隊長！ ポルテさん！\n こちらに いらっしゃったのです:
<pc>! Porte! I see you've decided
to join us.

311386.「ハッハッハッ！ 何言ってるんだ。\n 見てみろ 健康そのもの。\n 絶好調だぜ:
Nyahaha! Whaddya mean? Look at me!
I'm fit as a fiddle. Tip-top condition!

311387.「私たち エドアルドさんに とても\n 良くしていただいて……すばらしい贈り物ま:
Eduardo has been quite generous to us.
He even gave us a wonderful gift...

311388.「ムニエカは 本当に すてきな町。\n 私 すっかり ここが気に入ってしまって…:
Munieka really is an amazing town. I've
become quite stricken with it... That's why,
I want to ask you something...

311389.「みんなで一緒に この町で 暮らしませんか？: Why don't we all live together here?

311391.「そうそう この町のヤツらと 毎日\n 歌ったり踊ったり……ずっと楽しく暮らすん:
Yes, yes! I'll sing and I'll dance every day
with the townspeople...it'll be a blast.
Whaddya think? Doesn't that sound nice?!

311392.「ここにいれば 何もかもが 安心だ。\n 俺たちを苦しめるものは 何もない。\n:
Everything's safe here and nothing can hurt
us. This place might as well be heaven!

311393.「エドアルドも 町のみんなも\n 俺たちを 歓迎してくれてる。\n 悪い話じゃね:
Both Eduardo and all the townsfolk are
welcoming us here. That's not so bad, is
it?

311394.「ね？ <cs_pchero>さん。\n 私たちと ムニエカの町にとどまり\n:
Well? Let's stay here in Munieka and live out
the rest of our days happily ever after.
Shall we?<yesno><close>

311395.「まぁ うれしい！\n みんなで 幸せになりましょうね……。:
My, how happy! Let's all share this happiness
together...

311396.「<cs_pchero>の バカーッ！\n お母さんを 助けるんじゃなかったの！:
You idiot! Weren't you going to save your
mother?! This whole thing is crazy!

311397.「おいおい！\n こんなウマい話を 断るなんて 冗談だろ！？:
Hey, hey! You gotta be crazy to turn down an
amazing offer like this!

311398.「そうだよね <cs_pchero>！\n 一刻も早く お母さんを 助けなきゃだ:
That's right! You can't waste any time in
saving your mother. Besides, this whole
thing just reeks of crazy!

311399.「エッちゃんと ナブおじさんが\n こんなこと 言うはずない。\n きっと 誰か:
The real Estie and Mr. Nab would never say
things like that. Someone must be
controlling them.

311400.「そんな ひどい……！\n どうして 理解してくださらないのですか？\n おふた:
What a horrible thing to say...! Why can't
you understand...? I just want you two
to be happy.

311401.「……残念だが しかたねえ。\n 言うこと聞かない 悪い子には\n オシオキが必:
...too bad, but there's no helpin' it now.
Bad kids who don't listen need to be
shown some discipline.

311402.「ええ……そうですね……。\n 多少 痛い目を見せてでも\n わかってもらわなけ:
Yes, you're right... We have to make them
understand, even if it means showing them
a little pain...

311405.「エッちゃん ナブおじさん……？\n や やりすぎちゃったかな……。:
Estie...? Mr. Nab...?
W-we might've overdid it just a tad...

311407.「ふたりそっくりに作られた……人形だ。:
They were made to look exactly like them...
...they're dolls.

311408.「お見事！ 最高のショーだったね！\n 感動したよ！:
Well done! That was the best show I've ever
seen! I'm impressed!

311409.「……やっぱり\n エドアルドさんの しわざだったんだね。: I knew it... So Eduardo was behind all this.

311410.「ソレは 僕から キミたちへの贈り物なのだが\n まだ未完成でね。自力で動くこと:
Those were a gift from me to you two, but they're not quite finished yet. They can't move on their own, so I've been controlling
them.

311411.「安心したまえ。今は 空っぽの人形だけど\n ここに ふたりの魂が入れば ちゃー:
No need to worry. They're just just empty dolls right now, but if we put both of their souls inside juuuust right, they'll be able
to move around and chat away all on their own!

311412.「キャァ！？ 何するの！ 離してっ！: Aaah! What are you doing?! Let go of me!!

311413.「この感触……。\n <cs_pchero>！ この人たちも 人形だよっ。\n:
This is... <cs_pchero>!
These people are dolls too! It can't be...
are all the people in this town...?

311414.「そう お察しの通り\n ムニエカの住民は 全員 人形さ。\n もちろん この僕:
That's right. As you may have guessed, the
citizens of Munieka are aaaaall dolls.
Of course, I am no exception.

311415.「信じられないといった顔だね。\n そうだなぁ すべては 奇跡のチカラの賜物……:
Your face tells me you can't believe it.
Well...everything is a gift from the power
of miracles...or something like that.

311416.「キミたちを 眠らせたのは 他でもない。\n キミたちも 今の肉体を捨て 僕たち:
I put you to sleep because I had hoped that
you'd be willing to give up your current
bodies to become dolls like us.

311417.「えぇ！ 今ある肉体を捨てるって……\n そんなの 絶対ヤダよ！！:
What?! Giving up my body...? There's
absolutely no way!!

311418.「おやおや 怖がる必要なんてないよ。\n 今より性能のいい身体に 生まれ変わるん:
Come, now. There's no need to be scared. You'll be reborn into a body that performs even better than the one you have now.
Doesn't that sound great?!

311419.「この世界で 生きていくには\n ヒトの身体は もろすぎる。\n みんな 簡単に:
Mortal bodies are just too fragile to survive
in this world. We all break down too easily
and eventually die...

311420.「だが 人形の身体であれば 多少の故障なら\n 修理できるし 完全に壊れたとして:
But with a doll body, you can get fixed if anything breaks. And as long as your soul's still there, you can be rebuilt if you
completely break, right?

311421.「この町の平和と笑顔を\n 守りつづけることが 僕の責務だからね。\n みんなを:
It's my duty to keep the peace of this town
and keep people smiling. I can't allow
anyone to die.

311422.「僕は キミたちのことが 本当に気に入った。\n だから キミたちにも 死んでほ:
I reeeeally like you all. That's why I don't
want you dying. I want you to stay here and
live in this town forever!

311423.「いい……いいぞ！\n これほどまでに 心躍るモチーフに\n お目にかかるのは:
I just...love it! It's been so long since I've
seen such an exciting design!

311424.「……<cs_pchero>君 キミは 本当に\n すばらしい人生を 歩んできた:
You've had quite an amazing life, haven't
you? You will make an amazing doll.
I assure you!

311425.「キミたちの存在を 永遠のものにしてあげる。\n 僕たちと この町で ずっと楽し:
I will make your existence everlasting.
Let's all happily live together in this town,
forever...

311427.「エッちゃん！ ナブおじさん！\n 良かった！ ホンモノなんだね！:
Estie! Mr. Nab! Thank goodness!
It's the real you!

311428.「エドアルドさんよぉ？\n 相手の了承もなく 人形に改造しようとするたぁ\n ち:
Well, Eduardo? Don't you think it's a bit
much to be turning people into dolls
without their say so?

311429.「人形の身体なんか\n まっぴらごめんの こんこんちきだぜ！\n わかったら さ:
I'm just not interested into turnin' into a
doll, got it? So just give it up!

311430.「なぜ 理解してくれないんだい？ 人形の身体は\n 生身の肉体より ずーっと い:
Why can't you understand? A doll's body is
faaar superior to one made of flesh, you know?
Just look at this beauty, this durability...

311431.「……ええっと。\n う 動かなくなってしまいましたね。:
Umm...
I...it seems to have stopped moving...

311432.「なんてことだッ！\n 軽く たたいただけで 故障してしまうとは……\n まさか:
I don't believe it! To think the lightest of
taps could cause it to break like this...
Has the power of miracles reached its limits?!

311433.「……へっ！ よくわからねえが\n 散々 好き勝手やってくれた礼は\n キッチリ:
...Hmph! I don't really get all this, but I
gotta make sure you pay for all the messing
around you've been doing.

311434.「……待って！ ご主人様に 悪気はないんです！\n 皆さまのことを 想いすぎて\:
...Wait! T-the Master meant no harm! He just
cares so much about everyone, and got too
carried away, that's all... So, please...

311435.「悪気がなかったら\n 何やってもいいってワケじゃねえだろ。\n おい 聞いてん:
If you didn't mean to do any harm, that
doesn't mean you can just do whatever you
want. Hey, are you listening, Eduardo?!

311436.「奇跡が消えれば ムニエカの町は終わる……。\n ちくしょう このままでは\n:
If our miracle disappears, Munieka is done
for... If things don't change, then I won't be
able to fulfill my promise...

311437.「お おい……どうした？\n 急に しおらしくなっちまったじゃねえか……。\n:
H...hey, what's with you? You got meek all of
a sudden. What's going on...?

311438.「……ああ すまない。そうだね。\n キミたちにも ちゃんと\n 説明したほうが:
...right, I'm sorry. I guess I'd better
explain everything to you all.

311439.「もう少し 落ちつけそうな場所……\n ２階にある僕の私室で 話そうか。:
Shall we talk in a more calming place?
We can use my private office on the
second floor.

311440.「……それで？ 説明よりも先に 俺たちに\n 何か 言うことが あるんじゃないの:
...well? Isn't there something you should be
sayin' to us before you explain everything?

311442.「はて？ じゃないよ！\n いきなり 人形にされそうになって\n あたしたち す:
Don't "huh" us! We were almost turned into
dolls! It was really scary!

311443.「ハハハ ごめんごめん。サプライズの\n つもりだったんだが 演出過剰だったかね:
Haha, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I meant for it to
be a surprise, but I guess it was a bit too
dramatic. I'll be more careful next time!

311445.「エドアルドさん。先ほど\n 住民の方が 突然 倒れてしまいましたが\n 大丈夫:
Mr. Eduardo...before we came here, one of your
citizens collapsed. Will he be all right?

311446.「ああ 取り乱してしまって 悪かったね。\n 一応 動けることは\n 動けると:
Yeah, sorry for getting so worked up about
that. He should still be able to move at the
very least...

311447.「しかし それも いつまでもつか。\n 奇跡のチカラの枯渇だけは どうしようもな:
But for how much longer...? There's nothing
we can do about our power of miracles
running dry.

311448.「奇跡の……枯渇？\n ムニエカのみんなが 人形なのと\n 何か 関係があるの？:
Power of miracles...running dry? What's that
have to do with everyone here being a doll?

311449.「僕たちは 大昔 この世界を襲った災害によって\n 生身の肉体を 失ってしまって:
We lost our flesh and blood due to a disaster
that befell this world a long time ago. We
should've all died then, but...

311450.「この町を訪れていた ふしぎなチカラを持つ\n 旅人の女性が 死にかけの\n 僕:
A traveling woman with magic powers visited
this town, and she saved our lives.

311451.「彼女のチカラで 魂と人形を結びつけることで\n 僕らは 生身の身体のときと同様:
Her power to connect a soul to a doll allowed
us to live as if we had real bodies. It was
truly a miracle.

311452.「だが……それから 長い年月が経ち\n 僕らの身体に宿った 奇跡のチカラが\n:
However...the power of miracles that resides
inside of us seems to have gradually faded
away as the years passed by...

311453.「奇跡のチカラが 完全に失われれば\n 魂と人形の結びつきも 失われ……\n ム:
If that power is completely lost, then there would no longer be a connection between soul and doll... Everyone in Munieka would
die.

311454.「そんな……。その女性は\n 今 どちらにいらっしゃるのですか？: That's terrible... Where is this woman now?

311455.「僕は 長い間 彼女と共に\n 町の復興と住民の修繕に 努めていた。\n だが:
I worked alongside her for quite a long time to restore this town and its residents. But just as we were on the verge of completing the
reconstruction...

311456.「彼女は突然 この町から 姿を消してしまった。\n 今どこにいるかも どうしてい:
She suddenly disappeared. I don't know where
she is or what she is doing now.

311457.「……僕は 彼女と約束したんだ。\n 彼女が 好きだと言ってくれた ムニエカの町:
...and I made a promise to her. To forever
protect the smiles of everyone in Munieka,
the town that she loved so dearly.

311458.「このままでは 約束を果たせなくなってしまう。\n いったい どうすればいいんだ:
If I don't do something, then I won't be able
to fulfill my promise. What should I do...?

311460.「西にある森の奥 精霊の泉……。\n あそこになら 残っているかも……。:
Deep in the western woods is a place called
the Spring of Spirits... There may be some
left there...

311461.「彼女が足しげく通っていた 泉か……。\n たしかに あの泉には 古き精霊の祝福:
She often visited that spring... Indeed, there
is a legend that that spring is blessed by
ancient spirits.

311462.「今思えば 彼女は 泉のチカラを使い\n 奇跡を起こしていたのかもしれない。\n:
Come to think of it...she may have used that
spring's power to create a miracle... If only
we had the water from that spring...

311463.「だが 今や あの森は\n 魔物が生息する 危険な場所だ。\n ムニエカの住民で:
But now that forest is a really dangerous
place crawling with monsters. The people
here would stand no chance.

311464.「なら あたしたちが泉の水を取ってくるよ！\n エドアルドさんは ともかく\n:
Then we'll go and get the spring water!
I feel bad for Eduardo and everyone else
living here!

311465.「ええ……エドアルドさんがしたことは\n たしかに 許されませんが 住民の皆さん:
Yes...while we can't forgive what you've done
to us, we cannot just abandon the
townspeople.

311466.「やれやれ……あんな目にあったってのに\n 嬢ちゃんたちは 優しいな。\n ま:
For Pete's sake...you girls are quite sweet even after everything that's happened. Well, we ride this ship together. I'll
tag along.

311467.「ああ……ありがとう！\n キミたちは なんて すばらしいんだ！\n ますます:
Ohhhh...thank you! You're all just so amazing!
I'm even MORE tempted to turn you into
dolls now!

311468.「……冗談はさておき 泉は ムニエカ地方の\n 西の森の中だ。危険な場所なので:
...joking aside, the spring is in the forest west of the Munieka Region. It's quite dangerous, so I'll grant you special
permission to enter.

311469.「み…道案内は ドロテアにお任せください。\n しょ…正直 すごく怖いですけど…:
P...please leave it to Mudara to show you the way. T...to be honest, she's very s-scared... But I want to be of use to the M-master...
and everyone else...!

311470.「それでこそ 僕のドロテア！\n ありがとうっ 愛しているよ！:
That's my Mudara!
Thank you! I love you!

311471.「頼りにしてるからね ドロテア！\n さぁ ムニエカの町を救うため\n みんなで:
We'll leave it to you, Mudara!
Let's go to that spring so we can save
everyone in town!

311473.「木々が 結晶で\n 固められているようですね……。: The trees appear to be crystallized...

311474.「なんつーか……キレイなんだけどよぉ。\n ちょっとばかり 不気味な景色だよな。:
It's kinda...beautiful in a way, but also...
kinda eerie.

311475.「もともとは 普通の森だったんですが\n 世界を襲った大災害を きっかけに\n:
It used to be an ordinary forest, but it's
been like this ever since the disaster
that struck this world...

311476.「緑が たくさんあって……\n 町の人も ドロテアも\n この森のこと 大好きだ:
The forest was so green and lush...
Mudara and the townspeople sure loved
this forest...

311477.「魔物が 出るようになってから\n 誰も 近づかなくなっちゃいましたぁ……。\n:
Ever since the monsters came, no one dares
come near here anymore...
Sniff...

311478.「かつて この世界で いったい\n 何が起こったと いうのでしょうか？:
Just what happened to this world in the
past...?

311479.「精霊の泉は この森の 奥にあります。\n 気をつけて 進みましょうねぇ……。:
The Spring of Spirits is located deeper within
the forest. Let's proceed with caution...

311480.「ここが 精霊の泉ですぅ……。: This is the Spring of Spirits...

311481.「おいおい。\n 泉なんて 影も形もねえじゃねえか。: Hey, now...there's not a spring in sight.

311482.「道を 間違えてしまったのでしょうか……？: Did we go the wrong way...?

311483.「そ そんな……。\n ドロテア この場所が好きで\n たくさん来てたから 間違:
N...no way... Mudara loves this place dearly,
so there's no way she would go the wrong
way...

311485.「寒い……。\n 凍てつくような 悲しみと絶望のかたまり……。:
It's cold... A chilling mass of sorrow and
despair...

311486.「泣きながら 近づいてきてる……。\n すぐ そこまで来てる……。:
It's coming closer, and it's crying...
It's coming right at us...!

311492.「おっと！\n だいじょうぶかい お嬢さんがた？\n あぶないから 俺から 離れ:
Hey! You all right, ladies? Best stay close
to me for your own safety!

311493.「ポルテとドロテアは 俺に任せときな！\n おめえらは そのバケモノの相手を頼む:
Leave Porte and Mudara to me! You two take
care of that monster!

311494.「お任せください！\n いきましょう <cs_pchero>隊長！:
We'll take care of it!
Come on, <cs_pchero>!

311495.「今のは いったい なんだったのでしょう？\n 怨霊のたぐいのようにも\n 見え:
Just what was that, anyway? It looked like
a kind of vengeful spirit...

311496.「さてなぁ……。\n そっちも気になるが それよりも……:
Yeah, I wonder... I am curious, but more
importantly...

311497.「泉なんて どこにも見当たらねえ。\n カラッカラに 乾いた地面があるだけだ。:
There's no spring anywhere. The ground's
nothin' but parched and dry.

311498.「もしかしたら 長い時が経ちすぎて 泉の水も\n 涸れてしまったのかもしれません:
Perhaps too much time has passed, and the
spring's water has run dry... Together with
the power of miracles...

311499.「そ そんな……。\n みんなが 助からないって知ったら\n ご主人様 悲しみま:
T...that can't be... T-the Master would be
so sad if we knew we wouldn't survive...
B-besides...

311500.「ドロテアも ムニエカの町が 大好きだから……\n みんなに 死んでほしくないで:
Mudara loves everyone in Munieka, too...
I don't want everyone to die...
They can't... They just can't...

311501.「……こんなときに 何もできないなんて。\n あたしに もっと チカラがあれば\:
I feel so powerless at times like these...
If only I was stronger, then maybe I'd be
able to do something...

311502.「くやしい……くやしいよ……。\n ごめん ドロテア……。:
It's frustrating... So frustrating...
I'm sorry, Mudara...

311503.「泣くな バカ者。\n ……しかたない。\n 特別に 手を貸してやろうかの。:
Don't cry, you fool.
...Looks like I have no choice.
Shall I lend you a hand?

311505.「ふむ。たしかに 泉は\n ずいぶん前に 涸れてしまったようじゃ。\n だが……:
Yes. It is true that this spring ran dry a
long time ago. However...it is not dead.

311507.「別に 大したことはしておらん。\n この地に眠っていた 水脈に はたらきかけ\:
It was nothing. I simply tapped into the
underground water vein that lay dormant
here, which revitalized the spring.

311510.「お おい……いつもの元気は どうした？\n 人が変わったみてえじゃねえか。:
H-hey... Where's your usual spunk?
You seem different somehow...?

311511.「これで 町のみんなは助かるのですね！\n ふえええええ 本当に\n ありがとう:
This will save everyone in town!
Waaahh.... T-thank you so much...!!

311512.「なんじゃ 人の顔をまじまじと見て……。\n 我の顔に 何かついているか？\n<:
What's with the intense staring...?
Do I have something on my face?
<select_nc>
Didn't we meet at the unveiling ceremony?
You're...Porte, right?
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

311513.「そうか……。\n 我と 顔を合わせるのは あの時以来か。\n そなたには 話し:
I see... We haven't seen each other since
then, have we? I think now is a good time
to explain this to you.

311514.「どうやら 混乱させてしまったようじゃな。\n そなたには 話しておいても よい:
It appears that I've confused you. I think now
is a good time to explain this to you.

311515.「今 こうして 話している我と\n そなたと これまで行動を共にしていた\n ポ:
The person you are speaking to now, and the
Porte you've been traveling with...
They are different personalities.

311516.「我は故あって 普段は 存在を隠しておるが……\n まぁ 事情が事情だったからの:
Usually I conceal my presence for certain
reasons, but, well...with circumstances being
what they are, this time was an exception.

311517.「うむ……チカラを使い 少々疲れた。\n 悪いが しばらく 休ませてもらおう。:
Hmmm... I'm a bit tired from all the energy I
used. Sorry, but I'm going to rest a while.

311518.「創失の呪いを解くカギは\n 間違いなく この ゼニアスにある……。\n この地:
The key to solving the curse of unmaking is
no doubt here in Zeniath... You must seek
the truth hidden in this land.

311519.「……このバカ弟子を よろしく頼む。:
...And please watch over this stupid
apprentice.

311521.「あれっ？ 泉が復活してる！\n すごいすごい！ どうやったの？:
Huh...? The spring is back! That's just great!
How'd you do it?

311522.「どうやったのって お前がやったんだろうが。\n なんか 様子が変だったし\n:
"How'd you do it?" YOU did it, didn't you?
You were actin' all weird, and then you got
tired from using too much power.

311523.「……ええ！？ これ あたしがやったの？\n うそー！ なんだかわかんないけど\:
...what?! I did this? No way!
I have no idea what I did, but I'm
amazing!!

311524.「この泉の水……強い創生のチカラが 宿ってる。\n エドアルドさんの 言ってた通:
The spring's water...it has a really strong
power of creation. It might be able to help
the townspeople, just as Eduardo said!

311525.<cs_pchero>たちは ドロテアが用意していた\n水瓶が いっぱいになるよ:
<cs_pchero> and co. carefully collect water
from the spring, filling the water jug
that Mudara had prepared.

311526.<cs_pchero>は\n精霊の泉の水（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！<me:
<cs_pchero> received Spring of Spirits Water
(Key Item)!<me 60>

311527.「ふぅ……これで よし！\n さあ 急いで エドアルドさんに\n 泉の水を 持ち:
Whew...that should be it! Come on, let's
hurry and bring this back to Eduardo!

311528.「おお……！\n ありがとうございます エドアルドさん！: Ohhh...!! Thank you so much, Eduardo!

311529.「見てください！ あれだけ\n サビついたように 固まっていた身体が\n 自由に:
Would you just look! My body once stiff and
rusted solid now moves free as a bird!

311530.「すごいぞッ！\n まるで 新品同然じゃないか！！: Amazing! It's as good as new!!

311531.「キミたちが 水瓶いっぱいに\n 泉の水を 持ち帰ってくれたからね。\n 今後し:
You all brought back a jug filled with that
spring water. This town should be safe for
a long while!

311532.「これは 僕からの感謝の気持ちさ。\n 受けとってくれたまえ！:
I'd like to express my thanks to you!
Please take it!

311533.「良かったなぁ セアトロさん！\n アンタが 動かなくなったら\n 俺たちも 悲:
Seatro, what a relief! If you'd stopped
moving, we'd all be so sad.

311534.「これで あたしたちも 故障におびえず\n 暮らすことが できるんだね。\n 本:
Now we can live without fear of breaking
down. It's truly a blessing!

311535.「えへへ みんな うれしそうに笑ってる。\n いいことした後って 気持ちいいね。:
Ehehe... Everyone is smiling so happily.
Feels nice to do something good, doesn't
it? Oh...! Look!

311536.「星封の結晶に チカラが集まってる。\n ムニエカのみんなの ありがとうって気持:
The Benevogem filled up with power. It's
filled to the brim with the gratitude of
everyone in Munieka...

311537.「星のオーラが 手に入ったんだ！\n すっごく きれい……。: We got Benevolessence! It's so pretty...

311538.「ひとまず 一件落着か。\n この町については まだ いろいろ\n 気になること:
Guess everything's settled for the time being.
But you know, there are still many things
about this town that concern me...

311539.「俺たちは いったん 町のことを\n ドゥラに報告するために 折を見て\n はじ:
We'll head back to the Land of Beginnings
and let Dura know about what happened
here.

311540.「<pc>隊長 ポルテさん。\n 調査にご協力いただき ありがとうございます。\:
Thank you two for cooperating with our
exploration. We'll see each other again soon.

311541.「おや？ もう 行ってしまうのかい？\n さびしくなるなあ。:
Oh? Leaving already? We're sure going to
miss you.

311542.「皆さま 本当に\n ありがとうございましたぁ……。\n このご恩は 一生 忘れ:
Thank you all so much...
Mudara will never, ever forget your
kindness...

311543.「うん！ キミたちのおかげで\n 彼女との約束を破らずに 済んだからね。\n い:
Yeah! Thanks to you all, I got to keep my
promise to her. Words can't thank you
enough!

311544.「その人は\n エドアルドさんにとって 大切な人なんだね。\n これからも ずっ:
I see that she is very important to you.
Will you keep protecting this town forever
and ever?

311545.「当たり前じゃないか！\n 彼女が愛した ムニエカの町を\n 守ることこそが 僕:
Of course I will! Protecting this town that
she loved so dearly means everything to me.

311546.「もう 彼女は 戻ってこないだろうと\n 言う人もいる。だけど 僕は\n どれだ:
Some say that she'll never come back... But
I'll keep waiting, no matter how long it
takes!

311547.「彼女が帰ってきたときに 昔と何ひとつ\n 変わらない町を見て 心から笑ってほし:
When she does, I want her to see a town that hasn't changed one bit, with a heartful smile on her face! That's why I'll keep doing the
best I can.

311548.「それじゃあ みんな 元気で！\n もし 人形の身体になりたくなったら\n いつ:
Anyways, take care, all of you! If you feel
like you want to become a doll, feel free
to come and visit!

311549.「……あれっ？ なんだろ。\n 今 一瞬……何か 気配がしたような……？:
...Huh? What was that? For a moment there...
it felt like some kind of presence...?

311551.この地方の 調査を終えた。\n引きつづき ほかの地方の 調査に向かおう。:
The exploration of this region has been
completed. Continue to explore the remaining
regions.

311552.調査隊を派遣した\n３つの地方 すべてで 調査を終えた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろ:
Now that all three regions have been explored,
head back to the Land of Beginnings.

314637.「みんな 歌ったり 踊ったりしてるよ！\n なんだか 楽しそうな雰囲気の町だね。:
Everyone's singing and dancing! Seems like
this town has a fun atmosphere about it, huh?

314638.「<pc>隊長！ ポルテさん！\n 来てくださったのですね。: <pc>! Porte! It's good to see you.

314639.「あっ エッちゃんだー！\n 調査任務 お疲れさまー！:
Oh, Estie! Great work on your exploration
mission!

314640.「エ エッちゃんとは 私のことでしょうか？\n 愛称をつけてもらうのなんて 初め:
E-Estie...? Is that me you're referring to?
I've never been given a nickname before and
it's a little embarrassing, but...I'm happy.

314641.「……あれっ？\n そういえば ナブおじさんは？\n いっしょじゃないの？:
Huh...? Oh, by the way, where's Mr. Nab?
Is he not with you?

314642.「ナブおじさんとは……\n ナブレットさんのことですね。\n ふふっ あちらに:
Mr. Nab... Oh, you mean Nablette? He's right
over there.

314643.「ごきげんよう！\n ムニエカの町の 皆さん！:
Residents of Munieka!
How do you do?

314645.「ママ～ ふわふわの おにんぎょうさん～！\n かわいい～！: Mama! The fluffy doll is soooo cute!

314646.「こんな芸もできるなんて\n 最近のお人形は すごいわねぇ～。\n どんなしかけ:
It's amazing that dolls these days can do such
incredible tricks! What other kinds of tricks
do they have, I wonder?

314647.「おいおいッ 俺は お人形じゃねえって\n 何回も言ってるじゃねえか。\n プク:
Hey, hey! I've told you already that I'm no
doll. I come from a respectable race of
people called Pukulipo!

314649.「おっ <pc>隊長に\n ポルテの 嬢ちゃんじゃねえか！: Well, if it isn't the captain and Porte!

314650.「おや アンタたち エステラちゃんと\n ナブレットちゃんの 知り合いかい？\n:
Oh, so you two know Nablette and Estella?
Welcome to Munieka!

314651.「……そうだ！ この町の町長である\n エドアルドさんにも おふたりを\n ご紹:
Oh, that's right! I must introduce the both of
you to Mr. Eduardo. He's this town's mayor.

314652.「コイツ 全然 反省してねえな……。:
He doesn't seem to be sorry in the
slightest...
